original: divasena saha māsampi, tasmā aṭṭhārasavasse yeva cha māsādhikāni honti. Taṃ heṭṭhācatumāsādhika

original: ekūnavīsatime vasse pakkhipitvā ekamāsādhikāni vīsativassāni sabbaso paripuṇṇāni
analyzed: ekūnavīsatime vasse pakkhipitvā eka māsa adhikāni vīsati vassāni sabbaso paripuṇṇāni

original: honti. Evaṃ ekūnavīsativassato paṭṭhāya gabbhavīso upasampadāya vatthūti veditabbo.
analyzed: honti evam ekūnavīsati vassataḥ paṭṭhāya gabbha vīsaḥ upasampadāya vatthu uti veditabbo

original: Idāni purisattabhāvo ti bhikkhuniyā abhāvato purisapuggalova idāni vaṭṭatīti adhippeto
analyzed: idāni purisa atta bhāvaḥ ti bhikkhuniyāḥ abhāvataḥ purisa puggalaḥ uva idāni vaṭṭati iti adhippeto

original: tathā hi mātugāmassa pabbajitatthā pañcavassasatāni saddhammo tiṭṭheyya, paññattattā
analyzed: tathā hi mātu gāmassa pabbajita tthā pañca vassa satāni saddhammo tiṭṭheyya paññatta ttā

original: pana aparāni pañcavassasatāni ṭhassatīti evaṃ vassasahassameva paṭisambhidāppattasaddhammassa

original: patiṭṭhitabhāvo vutto. Mātugāmā ca nāma duppaññā tibbakilesā lāmakā ca. Bhagavatā

original: ca paṭhamabodhiyaṃ ādito paṭṭhāyameva mahāpajāpatiyā gotamiyā aṭṭhagarudhammapaṭiggahaṇena

original: upasampadatte anuññātepi sāsanassa aciraṭṭhitikabhāvo vutto. Duppaññattā itthiyo

analyzed: rakkhitum na sakkonti lāmakattā api tāḥ aṭṭha samāpattim labhantā api brāhma pārisajjam

original: nātikkamanti, evaṃ bhikkhuniyā abhāvato idāni purisapuggaloti vuttaṃ. Imasmiṃ ṭhāne

original: ṭhatvā cattāri khettāni veditabbāni tathā hi mātugāmassa pabbajitattā vassasahassameva
analyzed: ṭhatvā cattāri khettāni veditabbāni tathā hi mātugāmassa pabbajita ttā vassa sahassam eva

original: tāniyeva na hi pariyattiyā asati paṭivedho atthi. Nāpi pariyattiyā sati paṭivedho

analyzed: na hoti liṅgam pana pariyattiyā antarahitāya ciram pavattissati idam khandhaka bhāṇakānam

analyzed: matena vuttam aṅguttara nikāya ṭṭhakathāyam pi buddhānam parinibbānataḥ vassa sahassam eva

original: Eteneva upāyena anāgāmino sakadāgimino, sotāpannāti vuttaṃ. Idampi aṅguttaranikāye

analyzed: therānam vāda pakāsana attham vuttam na saṅgāhaka therānam tasmā aṭṭhakathā vacanam eva pamāṇam ti vuttam

original: Antimavatthuajjhāpannapubbanti pārājikabhikkhu, so abhabbo sāsane upasampadakammassa laddhuṃ.

analyzed: avatthu bhāvam pi na pāpuṇāti vikāla bhojana ādikam karontassa pana accayaḥ mam bhante

original: Titthiyapakkantako uttānoyeva.
analyzed: titthiya pakkantakaḥ uttānaḥ yā iva

original: avatthu bhaveyya, atha kasmā sese anapadisitvā tiracchānagatova avatthūti vuttanti.
analyzed: avatthu bhaveyya atha kasmā sese an apadisitvā tiracchāna gataḥ uva avatthu iti vuttanti

original: Sesānaṃ apākaṭavatthuttā, tathā hi sambuddhakāle tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbatto eko nāgarājā
analyzed: sesānam apākaṭa vatthu ttā tathā hi sambuddha kāle tiracchāna yoniyam nibbattaḥ ekaḥ nāga rājā

original: nāgayoniyā aṭṭīyati harāyati jigucchati. Athakho tassa nāgassa etadahosi kenanukho
analyzed: nāga yoniyā aṭṭīyati harāyati jigucchati athakho tassa nāgassa etat ahosi kena nu kho

original: ahaṃ upāyena nāgayoniyā parimucceyyaṃ khippañca manussattaṃ labheyyanti. Athakho
analyzed: aham upāyena nāga yoniyā parimucceyyam khippam ca manussattam labheyyanti athakho

original: tassa nāgassa etadahosi “ime kho samaṇāsakyaputtiyā dhammacārino samacārino brahmacārino
analyzed: tassa nāgassa etat ahosi ime kho samaṇa asakya puttiyāḥ dhamma cārino sama cārino brahmacārino

original: saccavādino sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā sace kho ahaṃ samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyyaṃ,
analyzed: sacca vādinaḥ sīlavantaḥ kalyāṇa dhammā sace kho aham samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyyam

original: evāhaṃ nāgayoniyā parimucceyyaṃ khippañca manussattaṃ paṭilabheyya”nti. Atha kho
analyzed: eva aham nāga yoniyā parimucceyyam khippam ca manussattam paṭilabheyyanti atha kho

original: so nāgo māṇavakavaṇṇena bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yāci. Taṃ bhikkhū pabbājesuṃ
analyzed: saḥ nāgaḥ māṇavaka vaṇṇena bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjam yāci tam bhikkhū pabbājesuṃ

original: upasampādesuṃ. Tena kho pana samayena so nāgo aññatarena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ paccantime
analyzed: upasampādesum tena kho pana samayena saḥ nāgaḥ aññatarena bhikkhunā saddhim paccantime

original: vihāre paṭivasati. Atha kho so bhikkhu rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccūṭṭhāya ajjhokāse
analyzed: vihāre paṭivasati atha kho so bhikkhu rattiyā paccūsa samayam paccūṭṭhāya ajjhokāse

original: caṅkamati. Atha kho so nāgo tassa bhikkhuno nikkhante vissaṭṭho niddaṃ okkamesi.
analyzed: caṅkamati atha kho saḥ nāgaḥ tassa bhikkhuno nikkhante vissaṭṭhaḥ niddam okkamesi

original: Sabbo vihāro ahinā puṇṇo, vātapānehi bhogā nikkhantā honti. Athakho so bhikkhu “vihāraṃ
analyzed: sabbaḥ vihāraḥ ahinā puṇṇaḥ vāta pānehi bhogāḥ nikkhantāḥ honti athakho so bhikkhu vihāram

original: pavisissāmī”ti kavāṭaṃ paṇāmento addasa sabbaṃ vihāraṃ ahināpuṇṇaṃ vātapānehi bhoge
analyzed: pavisissāmi iti kavāṭam paṇāmentaḥ addasa sabbam vihāram ahinā āpuṇṇam vāta pānehi bhoge

original: nikkhante. Disvāna bhīto vissaramakāsi. Bhikkhū upadhāvitvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavocuṃ
analyzed: nikkhante disvāna bhītaḥ vissaram akāsi bhikkhū upadhāvitvā tam bhikkhum etat avocuṃ

original: “kissa tvaṃ āvuso vissaramakāsī”ti. Ayaṃ āvuso sabbo vihāro ahinā puṇṇo vātapānehi
analyzed: kissa tvam āvuso vissaram akāsi iti ayam āvuso sabbaḥ vihāraḥ ahinā puṇṇaḥ vāta pānehi

original: bhogā nikkhantāti. Atha kho so nāgo tena saddena pabujjhitvā sake āsane nisīdi. Bhikkhū
analyzed: bhogāḥ nikkhantā ati atha kho saḥ nāgaḥ tena saddena pabujjhitvā sake āsane nisīdi bhikkhū

original: evamāhaṃsu “koci tvaṃ āvuso”ti. “Ahaṃ bhante nāgo”ti. “Kissa pana tvaṃ āvuso evarūpaṃ
analyzed: evam āhaṃsu koci tvam āvuso ti aham bhante nāgaḥ ti kissa pana tvam āvuso evarūpam

original: akāsī”ti. Atha kho so nāgo bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesī. Bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ
analyzed: akāsi iti atha kho saḥ nāgaḥ bhikkhūnam etam attham ārocesi bhikkhū bhagavato etam attham

original: ārocesuṃ. Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā
analyzed: ārocesuṃ atha kho bhagavā etasmim nidāne etasmim pakaraṇe bhikkhu saṅgham sannipātāpetvā

original: taṃ nāgaṃ etadavoca “tumhe khvattha nāgā avirūḷhidhammā imasmiṃ dhammavinaye, gaccha
analyzed: tam nāgam etat avoca tumhe khu attha nāgāḥ a virūḍhi dhammāḥ imasmin dhamma vinaye gaccha

original: tvaṃ nāga, tattheva cātuddase pannarase aṭṭhamiyā ca pakkhassa uposathaṃ upavasa,
analyzed: tvam nāga tattha iva cātuddase pannarase aṭṭhamiyā ca pakkhassa uposatham upavasa

original: evaṃ tvaṃ nāgayoniyā parimuccissasi khippañca manussattaṃ paṭilabhissasī”ti. Atha
analyzed: evam tvam nāga yoniyā parimuccissasi khippam ca manussattam paṭilabhissasi iti atha

original: kho so nāgo “avirūḷhadhammo kirāhaṃ imasmiṃ dhammavinayeti dukkhī dummano assūni
analyzed: kho saḥ nāgaḥ a virūḍha dhammo kira aham imasmin dhamma vinaye ti dukkhī dummanaḥ assūni

original: pavattayamāno vissaraṃ katvā pakkami. Atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi “dve me bhikkhave
analyzed: pavattayamānaḥ vissaram katvā pakkami atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi dve me bhikkhave

original: paccayā nāgassa sabhāvapātukammāya. Yadā ca sajātiyā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati,
analyzed: paccayāḥ nāgassa sabhāva pātukammāya yadā ca sajātiyā methunam dhammam paṭisevati

original: yadā ca vissaṭṭho niddaṃ okkamati. Ime kho bhikkhave dve paccayā nāgassa sabhāva
analyzed: yadā ca vissaṭṭhaḥ niddam okkamati ime kho bhikkhave dve paccayāḥ nāgassa

original: pātukammāya. Tiracchānagato bhikkhave na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo”ti
analyzed: pātukammāya tiracchānagataḥ bhikkhave na upasampādetabbaḥ upasampannaḥ na āsetabbaḥ ti

original: evaṃ tiracchānasseva pākaṭavattuttāti. Ettha ca pavattiyaṃ abhiṇhaṃ sabhāvapātukammadassanavasena
analyzed: evam tiracchānassa iva ettha ca pavattiyam abhiṇham sabhāva pātu kamma dassana vasena

original: “dve paccayā”ti vuttaṃ. Nāgassa pana pañcasu kālesu sabhāvapātukammaṃ hoti paṭisandhikāle,
analyzed: dve paccayā ti vuttam nāgassa pana pañcasu kālesu sabhāva pātukammam hoti paṭisandhi kāle

original: tacapajahananakāle, sajātiyā methunakāle, vissaṭṭha niddokkamanakāle, cutikāleti.
analyzed: tacapajahanana kāle sajātiyā methuna kāle vissaṭṭha niddokkamana kāle cuti kāle iti

original: Nanu ca devāpi upasampadāya avatthuyeva, atha kasmā cattāro apāyikāva upasampadāya
analyzed: nanu ca devā api upasampadāya avatthuyā iva atha kasmā cattāraḥ upasampadāya

original: avatthūti vuttanti. Saccaṃ, tathāpi devānaṃ abhabbattā paṭivedhasāsanassa ṭhitattā
analyzed: avatthu uti vuttan ti saccam tathā api devānam abhabba ttā paṭivedha sāsanassa ṭhita ttā

original: te abhabbato visuṃ karaṇatthāya evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vakkhati hi samantapāsādikāya
analyzed: te abhabbataḥ visum karaṇa atthāya evam vuttan ti daṭṭhabbam vakkhati hi samantapāsādikāya

original: vinayaṭṭhakathāya mahāvagge “tiracchānagato bhikkhaveti ettha nāgo vā hotu supaṇṇamāṇavakādīnaṃ
analyzed: vinaya ṭṭhakathāya mahā vagge tiracchāna gataḥ bhikkhave ti ettha nāgaḥ vā hotu supaṇṇa māṇavaka ādīnam

original: vā aññataro antamaso sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ upādāya yo koci amanussajātiyo sabbova imasmiṃ
analyzed: vā aññataraḥ antamasaḥ sakkam deva rājānam upādāya yaḥ koci a manussa jātiyaḥ sabbaḥ uva imasmin

original: atthe tiracchānagatoti veditabbo”ti, tena “tiracchānagatoti yokoci amanussabhūto”ti
analyzed: atthe tiracchāna gatoti veditabbo ti tena tiracchāna gatoti yokoci a manussa bhūtoti

original: vuttanti. Ettha cāha yadi nāgasupaṇṇā paṭisandhiyā lāmakā bhaveyya, atha kasmā vidhurajātake
analyzed: vuttam ti ettha ca āha yadi nāgasupaṇṇā paṭisandhiyā lāmakā bhaveyya atha kasmā vidhura jātake

analyzed: cattāraḥ janāḥ nāga supaṇṇa sakka dhanañcaya korabyesu bhavanesu tam tat eva ṭhānam patthentā

analyzed: dāna ādīni puññāni karonti tesu ekaḥ āyu pariyosāne sa putta dāraḥ nāga bhavane nāga rājā

analyzed: hutvā nibbatti ekaḥ supaṇṇa bhavane simbali vimāne supaṇṇa rājā hutvā nibbatti ekaḥ

original: tāvatiṃsabhavane sakko hutvā nibbatti, eko dhanañcayakorabyarañño aggamahesiyā kucchimhi
analyzed: tāvatiṃsa bhavane sakkaḥ hutvā nibbatti ekaḥ aggamahesiyā kucchimhi

original: nibbattīti catunnampi janānaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ kusalakammeneva pavattabhāvo vutto yadi
analyzed: nibbattī iti catunnam pi janānam paṭisandhiyam kusala kammena iva pavatta bhāvaḥ vuttaḥ yadi

analyzed: kusala kammena bhaveyya kusalā cetanā vipākānam khandhānam kaṭattā ca rūpānam kamma paccayena

analyzed: paccayaḥ ti imissā api paṭṭhāna pāḷiyā ahetukānam pi paṭisandhi khaṇe kamma paccaya bhāvo

original: vutto bhaveyya, na panevaṃ vattabbaṃ atha kathañcidaṃ paccetabbanti. Vuccate, nikantiyā
analyzed: vuttaḥ bhaveyya na pana ivam vattabbam atha kathañcidam paccetabbam ti vuccate nikantiyā

original: balavattā sattavidhamethunasaṃyogattā ca aparisuddhā tesaṃ kusalacetanā, aparisuddhāyeva
analyzed: balavat tā sattavidha methuna saṃyoga ttā ca aparisuddhā tesam kusala cetanā aparisuddhāya eva

original: sugatibhūmiyaṃ janetuṃ na sakkonti. Duggatibhūmiyaṃ pavattamānāpi kammā yūhanakāle
analyzed: sugati bhūmiyam janetum na sakkonti duggati bhūmiyam pavattamānā api kammā yūhana kāle

original: taṃ taṃ bhūmipatthanā taṇhāsampayuttāpubbabhāgacetanā balena tesu tiracchānabhūmīsu
analyzed: tam tam bhūmi patthanā taṇhā sampayuttā a pubba bhāga cetanā balena tesu tiracchāna bhūmīsu

analyzed: nibbattanti na aññena akusalena evam hi patthita patthanā siddhā api bhaveyya yadi

original: aññena akusalakammena bhaveyya, icchitapatthanāpi asiddhāva bhaveyya. Nikantica nāmesā
analyzed: aññena akusala kammena bhaveyya icchita patthanā api asiddhā ava bhaveyya nikanti ca nāma esā

analyzed: dīgha nikāye āgataḥ atthikehi tattha oloketabbo sattavidha methuna saṃyoga vasena api

analyzed: sattāḥ dukkhataḥ na muccanti vuttam hi bhagavatā idha brāhmaṇaḥ ekaccaḥ samaṇaḥ vā brāhmaṇaḥ

analyzed: carati saṃyuttaḥ methuna saṃyogena na parimuccati jātiyā na parimuccati

analyzed: ha iva kho mātugāmena saddhim dvayaṃdvaya samāpattim samāpajjati na pi mātugāmassa

original: sādiyati, api ca kho mātugāmena saddhiṃ saṃjagghati saṃkīḷati saṃkeḷāyati, so tadassādeti…pe…

original: dukkhasmāti vadāmi. Punaca paraṃ brāhmaṇa idhekacco samaṇo vā…pe… na heva kho mātugāmena

original: saṅgahitoti veditabbo.
analyzed: saṅgahitaḥ iti veditabbaḥ

original: Mātughātake pana yena manussitthibhūtāpi ajanikā posā vanikā mātā vā mahāmātā vā
analyzed: mātu ghātake pana yena manussitthi bhūtā api ajanikā posā vanikā mātā vā mahāmātā vā

original: cūḷamātā vā janikāpi amanussitthibhūtā mātā ghātitā, tassa pabbajjā na vāritā, na
analyzed: cūḷa mātā vā janikā api a manussitthi bhūtā mātā ghātitā tassa pabbajjā na vāritā na

original: ca anantariko hoti. Tiracchānitthiyopi manussapurisamāgamma manussabhūtaṃ puttaṃ
analyzed: ca anantarikaḥ hoti tiracchānitthiyaḥ pi manussa purisam āgamma manussa bhūtam puttam

original: vijāyanti kontaputtā dvebhātikattherā viya tepi hi aṇḍajāyeva, tathā hi petaloke
analyzed: vijāyanti konta puttāḥ dvebhātika ttherāḥ viya te pi hi tathā hi peta loke

original: tiracchāne manusse cāti imesu tīsu bhūmīsu catasso yoniyo sambhavanti. Manussesu
analyzed: tiracchāne manusse ca ati imesu tīsu bhūmīsu catasso yoniyaḥ sambhavanti manussesu

original: panettha kecideva opapātikā honti, seyyathāpi mahāpadumakumārādayo. Aṇḍajāpi konta
analyzed: pana ittha kecid eva opapātikāḥ honti seyyathā api mahāpaduma kumāra ādayaḥ aṇḍajāḥ api

original: puttā dvebhātikattherā viya. Vitthāro pana sīhaḷavatthusmiṃ oloketabbo. Ettha ca
analyzed: puttāḥ dvebhātika therāḥ viya vitthāraḥ pana sīhaḷa vatthusmiṃ oloketabbo ettha ca

original: kontāti kinnarī, tassā puttā kontaputtā, sā hi rañño asokadhammarājassa kāle vanacarakena
analyzed: kontā ati kinnarī tassā puttā konta puttā sā hi raññaḥ asokadhammarājassa kāle vana carakena

original: labhitvā manussasaṃvāsamāgamma dve putte vijāyitvā “idāni dārake pahāya na gamissatī”ti
analyzed: labhitvā manussa saṃvāsam āgamma dve putte vijāyitvā idāni dārake pahāya na gamissati iti

original: saññāya vanacarako tassā potthaṃ adāsi, sā potthaṃ labhitvā pakkhanditvā sakaṭṭhānameva
analyzed: saññāya vana carako tassā pottham adāsi sā pottham labhitvā pakkhanditvā saka ṭṭhānam eva

original: gatā kinnariyo hi potthaṃ vinā pakkhandituṃ na sakkonti, teneva tāpaso “mā potthaṃ
analyzed: gatāḥ kinnariyaḥ hi pottham vinā pakkhanditum na sakkonti tena iva tāpasaḥ mā pottham

original: assā adāsī”ti āha. Kammapaccaya utusamuṭṭhānañhi tāsaṃ potthaṃ, rañño cakkavattissa
analyzed: assā adāsi iti āha kamma paccaye utu samuṭṭhānam hi tāsam pottham rañño cakkavattissa

original: cakkaratanaṃ viya, tathā hi cakkavattino vehāsagamanādi puññavato iddhināma, na tena
analyzed: cakka ratanam viya tathā hi cakkavattinaḥ vehāsa gamana ādi puññavataḥ iddhi nāma na tena

original: cakkaratanaṃ vā hatthiassaratanaṃ vā vinā attano sabhāveneva gantuṃ sakkonti. Tattha
analyzed: cakka ratanam vā hatthi assa ratanam vā vinā attano sabhāvena iva gantum sakkonti tattha

original: cakkaratanaṃ rañño cakkavattissa kammabalena nibbattattā samuddamajjhe jāyamānampi
analyzed: cakkaratanam raññaḥ cakkavattissa kamma balena nibbatta ttā samudda majjhe jāyamānam pi

original: kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma. Hatthiassaratanāni pana kammapaccayakammasamuṭṭhānāni
analyzed: kamma paccaya otu samuṭṭhānam nāma hatthi assa ratanāni pana kamma paccaya kamma samuṭṭhānāni

original: nāma. Pakkhīnaṃ vehāsagamanādikā kammavipākajā iddhi. Kinnariyo pana potthaṃ vinā
analyzed: nāma pakkhīnam vehāsa gamana ādikā kamma vipāka jā kinnariyo pana pottham vinā

original: attano sabhāvena pakkhandituṃ na sakkonti, tasmā tāsaṃ potthaṃ kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhānanti
analyzed: attanaḥ sabhāvena pakkhanditum na sakkonti tasmā tāsam pottham kamma paccaya otu samuṭṭhānam ti

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Keci pana devānaṃ alaṅkārā viya paṭisandhiyā saha āgatoti vadanti, na
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam keci pana devānam alaṅkārāḥ viya paṭisandhiyā saha āgataḥ iti vadanti na

original: taṃ paccetabbaṃ, aṇḍajajalābujānaṃ tathā asambhavato. Kecipi pavatti kāle katanti
analyzed: tam paccetabbam aṇḍa ja jalābu jānam tathā asambhavataḥ kecipi pavatti kāle

original: vadanti, tampi ayuttameva, saṃsedajāpi padumagabbhevā veḷugabbhe vā nibbattā pokkharasātibrāhmaṇapadumavatīveḷuvatīdevīādayo
analyzed: vadanti tam pi ayuttam eva saṃseda jā api paduma gabbhe vā veḷu gabbhe vā nibbattā pokkhara sāti brāhmaṇa padumavatī veḷuvatī devī ādayo

original: viya. Jalābujā pana pākaṭāyeva. Yena sayaṃ tiracchānabhūtena manussitthibhūtā mātā
analyzed: viya jalābu jā yena sayam tiracchāna bhūtena manussitthi bhūtā mātā

original: ghātitā, sopi ānantariko na hoti tiracchānagatattā panassa pabbajjā paṭikkhittā,
analyzed: ghātitā saḥ api ānantarikaḥ na hoti tiracchāna gata ttā panassa pabbajjā paṭikkhittā

original: kammaṃ panassa bhāriyaṃ hoti, ānantariyaṃ āhacca tiṭṭhati. Manussitthiyopi tiracchānamāgamma
analyzed: kammam panassa bhāriyam hoti ānantariyam āhacca tiṭṭhati manussitthiyaḥ pi tiracchānam āgamma

original: gabbhaṃ janenti, seyyathāpi bhūridattassa mātā itthiyo hi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi gabbhaggahaṇaṃ
analyzed: gabbham janenti sā iyyathā api bhūridattassa mātā itthiyaḥ hi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi gabbha ggahaṇam

original: hoti - ajjhācārena, kāyasaṃsaggena, coḷaggahaṇena, asucipānena, nābhiparāmasanena,
analyzed: hoti ajjhācārena kāya saṃsaggena coḷa gahaṇena asuci pānena nābhiparāmasanena

original: rūpadassanena, saddena gandhenāti. Tattha ajjhācārena sudinnassa purāṇadutiyikā gabbhaṃ
analyzed: rūpa dassanena saddena gandhena ati tattha ajjhācārena sudinnassa purāṇa dutiyikā gabbham

original: gaṇhitvā pacchimabhavikaṃ suvaṇṇabimbasadisaṃ bījakaṃ nāma puttaṃ vijāyi. Kadāci
analyzed: gaṇhitvā pacchima bhavikam suvaṇṇa bimba sadisam bījakam nāma puttam vijāyi kadāci

original: ekaccā utusamaye chandarāgarattā purisānaṃ hatthagāhaveṇigāhaaṅgapaccaṅgaparāmasanaṃ
analyzed: ekaccāḥ utu samaye chanda rāga rattā purisānam hatthagāha veṇi gāha aṅga paccaṅga parāmasanam

original: sādiyantiyopi gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti. Evaṃ kāyasaṃsaggena gabbhaggahaṇaṃ hoti. Udāyittherassa
analyzed: sādiyantiyaḥ api gabbham gaṇhanti evam kāya saṃsaggena gabbha ggahaṇam hoti udāyi ttherassa

original: pana purāṇadutiyikā bhikkhunī taṃ asuciṃ ekadesaṃ mukhena aggahesi, ekadesaṃ coḷakeneva
analyzed: pana purāṇa dutiyikā bhikkhunī tam asucim eka desam mukhena aggahesi eka desam coḷakena iva

original: saddhiṃ aṅgajāte pakkhipi, sā tena gabbhaṃ gaṇhi. Evaṃ coḷaggahaṇena gabbhaggahaṇaṃ
analyzed: saddhim aṅga jāte pakkhipi sā tena gabbham gaṇhi evam coḷa ggahaṇena gabbha ggahaṇam

original: hoti. Migasiṅgatāpasassa mātā migī utusamaye tāpasassa passāvaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā sasambhavaṃ
analyzed: hoti miga siṅga tāpasassa mātā migī utu samaye tāpasassa passa avaṭṭhānam āgantvā sa sambhavam

original: pivi, sā tena gabbhaṃ gaṇhitvā migasiṅgaṃ nāma tāpasadārakaṃ vijāyi. Evaṃ asucipānena
analyzed: sā tena gabbham gaṇhitvā migasiṅgam nāma tāpasa dārakam evam asuci pānena

original: gabbhaggahaṇaṃ hoti. Sāmassa pana bodhisattassa mātā utusamaye nābhiparāmasanena
analyzed: gabbha ggahaṇam hoti sāmassa pana bodhisattassa mātā utu samaye nābhi parāmasanena

original: gabbhaṃ gaṇhitvā sāmatāpasadārakaṃ vijāyi, evaṃ maṇḍabyassa ca caṇḍapajjo tassa ca
analyzed: gabbham gaṇhitvā sāma tāpasa dārakam evam maṇḍabyassa ca caṇḍapajjo tassa ca

original: mātā utusamaye nābhiparāmasanavasena, tattha ca diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya nābhiparāmasanena
analyzed: mātā utu samaye nābhi parāmasana vasena tattha ca diṭṭha maṅgalikāya nābhi parāmasanena

original: maṇḍabyassa nibbatti ahosi. Caṇḍapajjotassa mātu nābhiyaṃ vicchiko pharitvā gato,
analyzed: maṇḍabyassa nibbatti ahosi caṇḍapajjotassa mātu nābhiyam vicchikaḥ pharitvā gataḥ

original: tena caṇḍapajjotassa nibbatti ahosi. Idhekaccā itthī utusamaye purisasaṃsaggaṃ alabhamānā
analyzed: tena caṇḍapajjotassa nibbatti ahosi idha ekaccā itthī utu samaye purisa saṃsaggam a labhamānā

original: chandarāgavasena antogehegatāva purisaṃ upanijjhāyati, rājorodho viya, sā tena gabbhaṃ
analyzed: chanda rāga vasena purisam upanijjhāyati sā tena gabbham

original: gaṇhāti. Evaṃ rūpadassanena gabbhaggahaṇaṃ hoti. Balākāsu pana purisonāma natthi,
analyzed: gaṇhāti evam rūpa dassanena gabbha ggahaṇam hoti balākāsu pana puriso nāma natthi

original: tā utusamaye meghasaddaṃ sutvā gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti. Gāvīeva vā kadāci usabhagandhena
analyzed: tāḥ utu samaye megha saddam sutvā gabbham gaṇhanti gāvī eva vā kadāci usabha gandhena

original: gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti. Evaṃ gandhena gabbhaggahaṇaṃ hoti. Evaṃ aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi itthiyo
analyzed: gabbham gaṇhanti evam gandhena gabbha ggahaṇam hoti evam aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi itthiyo

original: gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti. Ettha ca pitusadisāyeva puttā honti, tasmā bhūridattādayo dhataraṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: gabbham gaṇhanti ettha ca pitu sadisāya iva puttāḥ honti tasmā bhūridatta ādayaḥ

original: nāgarājānaṃ paṭicca nāgāyeva honti. Caṇḍapajjotassa pana vicchikaṃ paṭicca manusso
analyzed: nāga rājānam paṭicca nāgāya iva honti caṇḍapajjotassa pana vicchikam paṭicca manusso

original: jāto, sambhavena ajātattā. Pitughātakepi eseva nayo.
analyzed: sambhavena a jāta ttā pitu ghātake pi eṣā iva nayaḥ

original: Arahantaghātako pana amanussa arahantadevataṃ vā manussajātiyaṃ vā avasesaṃ ariyapuggalaṃ
analyzed: arahanta ghātakaḥ pana amanussa arahanta devatam vā manussa jātiyam vā avasesam ariya puggalaṃ

original: ghātetvā anantariyo na hoti, pabbajjāpissa na vāritā, kammaṃ pana balavaṃ hoti. Tiracchāno
analyzed: ghātetvā anantariyaḥ na hoti pabbajjā apissa na vāritā kammam pana balavam hoti tiracchāno

analyzed: pana amanussa arahantam pi ghātetvā ānantarikaḥ na hoti kammam pana bhāriyam tiracchāna gata ttā

original: panassa pabbajjā vāritā. Bhikkhunidūsakasaṅghabhedakāni pākaṭāyeva.
analyzed: panassa pabbajjā vāritā bhikkhu nidūsaka saṅgha bhedakāni pākaṭāya iva

original: Lohituppādako pana yo tathāgatassa abhejjakāyatāya parūpakkamena cammaṃ chinditvā
analyzed: lohituppādakaḥ pana yaḥ tathāgatassa abhejja kāya tāya para upakkamena cammam chinditvā

original: lohitaṃ paggharituṃ na sakkoti, sarīrassa pana antoyeva ekasmiṃ ṭhāne lohitaṃ samosarati,
analyzed: lohitam paggharitum na sakkoti sarīrassa pana ekasmiṃ ṭhāne lohitam samosarati

original: āghātena patubbanamānaṃ sañcitaṃ hoti, tassa bahu apuññaṃ pasavati, ānantariko ca
analyzed: āghātena sañcitam hoti tassa bahu apuññam pasavati ānantarikaḥ ca

original: hoti, pabbajjāpissa vāritā, seyyathāpi devadatto. Yo pana jīvako viya rogavūpasamanatthaṃ
analyzed: hoti pabbajjā apissa vāritā seyyathā api devadatto yaḥ pana jīvakaḥ roga vūpasamana attham

original: phāletvā pūtimaṃsañca lohitañca nīharitvā phāsuṃ karoti, ayaṃ lohituppādako na hoti,
analyzed: phāletvā pūti maṃsam ca lohitam ca nīharitvā phāsum karoti ayam lohituppādakaḥ na hoti

original: bahupuññaṃ pasavati brahmapuññaṃ pasavati, seyyathāpi jīvakokomārabhacco.
analyzed: bahu puññam pasavati brahma puññam pasavati sā iyyathā api jīvaka ukomāra bhaccaḥ

original: Ubbhatobyañjanako pana itthi-purisavasena duvidho tattha itthiubhatobyañjanakassa
analyzed: ubbhatobyañjanakaḥ pana itthi purisa vasena duvidhaḥ tattha itthi ubhatobyañjanakassa

original: itthinimittaṃ pākaṭaṃ, purisanimittaṃ paṭicchannaṃ. Purisaubhatobyañjanakassa purisanimittaṃ
analyzed: itthi nimittam pākaṭam purisa nimittam paṭicchannam purisa aubhatobyañjanakassa purisa nimittam

original: pākaṭaṃ, itthinimittaṃ paṭicchannaṃ. Itthiubhatobyañjanakassa itthīsu purisattaṃ
analyzed: pākaṭam itthi nimittam paṭicchannam itthi ubhatas byañjanakassa itthīsu purisa ttam

original: karontassa itthinimittaṃ paṭicchannaṃ hoti, purisanimittaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti. Purisaubhatobyañjanakassa
analyzed: karontassa itthi nimittam paṭicchannam hoti purisa nimittam pākaṭam hoti

original: purisānaṃ itthibhāvaṃ upagacchantassa purisanimittaṃ paṭicchannaṃ hoti, itthinimittaṃ
analyzed: purisānam itthi bhāvam upagacchantassa purisa nimittam paṭicchannam hoti itthi nimittam

original: pākaṭaṃ. Itthiubhatobyañjanako sayañca gabbhaṃ gaṇhāti, parañca gaṇhāpeti. Purisa
analyzed: pākaṭam sayam ca gabbham gaṇhāti param ca purisa

original: ubhato byañjanako pana sayaṃ na gaṇhāti, paraṃ gaṇhāpeti. Idameva tesaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: ubhatas byañjanakaḥ pana sayam na gaṇhāti param idam eva tesam nānākaraṇam

original: Ubhatobyañjananti cettha “byañjananti nimittaṃ. Ubhato byañjanaṃ assa atthīti viggahena
analyzed: ubhatobyañjanam ti ca ittha byañjananti nimittam ubhatas byañjanam assa atthi iti viggahena

original: “ubhatobyañja”nti vakkhatha, ekassa dve indriyāni honti, atha ekamevāti. Ekameva
analyzed: ubhatobyañjanti vakkhatha ekassa dve indriyāni honti atha ekam eva ati ekam eva

original: na dve, “yassa itthindriyaṃ uppajjati, tassa purisindriyaṃ uppajjatīti no. Yassa
analyzed: na dve yassa itthi indriyam uppajjati tassa purisa indriyam uppajjati iti no yassa

original: vā pana purisindriyaṃ uppajjati, tassa itthindriyaṃ uppajjatīti noti ekasmiṃ santāne
analyzed: vā pana purisa indriyam uppajjati tassa itthi indriyam uppajjati iti no ti ekasmin santāne

original: indriya dvayassa paṭisevitattā. Tañca kho itthiubhatobyañjanakassa itthindriyaṃ,
analyzed: indriya dvayassa paṭisevita ttā tat ca kho itthi ubhatobyañjanakassa itthi indriyaṃ

original: purisaubhatobyañjanakassa purisindriyamevāti. Yadi ekameva indriyaṃ, evaṃ ubhatobyañjanakabhāvo
analyzed: purisa aubhatobyañjanakassa purisa indriyam eva ati yadi ekam eva indriyam evam ubhatobyañjanaka bhāvaḥ

original: kathaṃ siyā. Indriyaṃ byañjanakāraṇanti vuttaṃ, tañca tassa natthīti. Vuccate na
analyzed: katham siyā indriyam byañjana kāraṇan ti vuttam tat ca tassa natthi iti vuccate na

original: itthindriyaṃ purisabyañjanassa kāraṇaṃ, tathā purisindriyampi itthibyañjanakassa,
analyzed: itthi indriyam purisa byañjanassa kāraṇam tathā purisa indriyam pi itthi byañjanakassa

original: kasmā sadā abhāvatoti, tathā hi itthi ubhatobyañjanakassa yadā itthiyā rattaṃ hoti,
analyzed: kasmā sadā abhāvato ti tathā hi itthi ubhatobyañjanakassa yadā itthiyā rattam hoti

original: tadā purisabyañjanaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, itthibyañjanaṃ paṭicchannaṃ tathā purisaubhatobyañjanakassapi.
analyzed: tadā purisa byañjanam pākaṭam hoti itthi byañjanam paṭicchannam tathā

original: Yadi tesaṃ indriyadvayaṃ byañjanānaṃ kāraṇaṃ bhaveyya, sadā byañjana dvayaṃ ekato
analyzed: yadi indriya dvayam kāraṇam sadā

original: tiṭṭheyya na pana tiṭṭhati, tasmā ekameva indriyanti niṭṭhametthāva gantabbaṃ. Byañjanakāraṇaṃ
analyzed: tiṭṭheyya na pana tiṭṭhati tasmai ekam eva indriyam ti niṭṭham ettha ava gantabbam byañjana kāraṇam

original: indriyaṃ pahāya rāgacittamevettha byañjanadvayassa kāraṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, tasmā itthiubhatobyañjanako
analyzed: indriyam pahāya rāga cittam eva itthā byañjana dvayassa kāraṇan ti daṭṭhabbam tasmai itthi ubhatobyañjanakaḥ

original: sayampi gabbhaṃ gaṇhāti, parampi gaṇhāpeti, purisaubhatobyañjanako paraṃ gaṇhāpeti,
analyzed: sayam pi gabbham gaṇhāti param pi gaṇhāpeti purisaubhataḥ byañjanakaḥ param gaṇhāpeti

original: sayaṃ pana na gaṇhāti, itthindriyasamaṅgisseva gabbhasambhavatoti. Kurundiyaṃ pana
analyzed: sayam pana na gaṇhāti itthi indriya samaṅgissa iva gabbha sambhavato ti kurundiyam pana

original: “yadi paṭisandhiyaṃ purisaliṅgaṃ, pavatte itthiliṅgaṃ nibbattati, yadi paṭisandhiyaṃ
analyzed: yadi paṭisandhiyam purisa liṅgam pavatte itthi liṅgam nibbattati yadi paṭisandhiyam

original: itthiliṅgaṃ, pavatte purisaliṅgaṃ nibbatī”ti paṭisandhiyaṃ liṅgasambhavo vutto, so
analyzed: itthi liṅgam pavatte purisa liṅgam nibbati iti paṭisandhiyam liṅga sambhavaḥ vuttaḥ saḥ

original: ayuttova. Kasmā, pavattiyaṃyeva itthiliṅgādīni samuṭṭhahanti. Paṭisandhiyameva samuṭṭhāti,
analyzed: kasmā itthi liṅga ādīni samuṭṭhahanti paṭisandhiyam eva samuṭṭhāti

original: na liṅgādīni. Indriyameva liṅganti na sakkā vattuṃ, indriyaliṅgānaṃ bhinnasabhāvattā,
analyzed: na liṅga ādīni indriyam eva liṅganti na sakkā vattum

original: yathā ca bīje sati rukkho sambhavati, nāsati, evameva indriye sati liṅgādīni sambhavanti
analyzed: yathā ca bīje sati rukkhaḥ sambhavati na asati evam eva indriye sati liṅga ādīni sambhavanti

original: bījasadisañhi indriyaṃ, rukkhasadisāni liṅgādīni evameva tesu puggalesu paṇḍakādayo
analyzed: bīja sadisam hi indriyam rukkha sadisāni liṅga ādīni evam eva tesu puggalesu paṇḍaka ādayaḥ

original: ekādasapuggalā tasmiṃ yeva bhave niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ na arahanti, tasmā abhabbā nāma.
analyzed: ekādasa puggalā tasmin yā iva bhave niyāmam okkamitum na arahanti tasmai abhabbā nāma

original: Ūnavīsati antimavatthuajjhāpannapubbā dve upasampadāya avatthumattameva, upanissaye
analyzed: ūnavīsati antima vatthu ajjhāpanna pubbā dve upasampadāya a vatthu mattam eva upanissaye

original: sati tasmiṃyeva bhave niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ arahanti, tasmā bhabbānāma honti.

original: Vatthusampattikathā niṭṭhitā.

original: dvinnaṃ baddhasīmānameva aññamaññaṃ sambhedajjhottharaṇaṃ sīmantarikaṃ vinā abyavadhāne
analyzed: dvinnam baddha sīmānam eva aññam aññam sambheda ajjhottharaṇam sīmantarikam vinā a byavadhāne

original: ṭhānañca bhagavatā anumatamevāti ñatvā aṭṭhakathācariyā idhāpi sīmantarikāvidhānamakaṃsu
analyzed: ṭhānam ca bhagavatā anumatam evā iti ñatvā aṭṭhakathā cariyāḥ idha api sīmantarikā vidhānam akaṃsu

original: visabhāgasīmānampi hi ekasīmanissitattaṃ ekasabhāvattañcāti dvīhaṅgehi samannāgate
analyzed: visabhāga sīmānam pi hi eka sīma nissita ttam eka sabhā vattam ca ati dvīhi aṅgehi samannāgate

original: sati eva sīmantarikaṃ vinā ṭhānaṃ sambhedāya hoti, nāsatīti daṭṭhabba’nti. Evaṃ nadīsamuddajātassaresu
analyzed: sati eva sīmantarikam vinā ṭhānam sambhedāya hoti na asati iti daṭṭhabbanti evam nadī samudda jātassaresu

original: samantāudakukkhepāti paññattasikkhāpadānurūpaṃ udakukkhepena paricchedaṃ dassetvā
analyzed: samantā udakukkhepā ti paññatta sikkhāpada anurūpam udakukkhepena paricchedam dassetvā

original: rassapabhave nadījātassarapadese udakukkhepena vināva attano sabhāvena gāmasīmāyamiva
analyzed: rassapa bhave nadī jātassara padese udakukkhepena vinā ava sabhāvena

original: sabbathā kappiyabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ sace pana nātidīghā hoti, pabhavato paṭṭhāya tyādimāha.
analyzed: sabbathā kappiya bhāvam dassetum sace pana na ati dīghā hoti pabhavataḥ paṭṭhāya tyādim āha

original: Tattha pabhavato paṭṭhāyāti yasmiṃ padese catumāsaparamā nadī sandati, tassa uparimabhāgato
analyzed: tattha pabhavataḥ paṭṭhāyāti yasmin padese catu māsa paramā nadī sandati tassa uparima bhāgataḥ

original: paṭṭhāyāti attho. Yāva mukhadvārā ti yāva nadītīramevettha mukhadvārāti adhippetā.
analyzed: paṭṭhāya iti atthaḥ yāva mukha dvārā ti yāva nadī tīram eva ittha mukha dvārā ati adhippetā

original: Sabbatthā’ti sabbasmiṃ nadīpadese udakukkhepasīmākammaṃ natthī ti udakukkhepena pavattā
analyzed: sabbattha ati sabbasmin nadī padese udakukkhepa sīmākammam natthi ti udakukkhepena pavattā

original: sīmā udakukkhepasīmā. Karitabbanti kammaṃ, karakaraṇeti dhātu, rammapaccayo. Karaṇeti
analyzed: sīmā udakukkhepa sīmā karitabbanti kammam kara karaṇe iti dhātu ramma paccayaḥ karaṇe iti

original: manodvāravīthiyā sattamakusalajavanacittasamuṭṭhāpitavāyodhātuyā vikārabhūto kāyapayogo,
analyzed: manaḥ dvāra vīthiyā sattama kusala javana citta samuṭṭhāpita vāyodhātuyā vikāra bhūto kāya payogo

original: tena kāyapayogena khipitabbaṃ uddhaṭaṃ kammanti vuccati paramatthavasena pana kāyapayogasaṅkhātāya
analyzed: tena kāya payogena khipitabbam uddhaṭam kammanti vuccati paramattha vasena pana kāya payoga saṅkhātāya

original: cittaṃ javāyodhātuyā vipphārena desantarappattisamuṭṭhāpikā aṭṭhakalāpapuñjāyeva.
analyzed: cittam java ayaḥ dhātuyā vipphārena desa antara ppatti samuṭṭhāpikā aṭṭha kalāpa puñjāya iva

original: Udakukkhepasīmāya kammaṃ udakukkhepasīmākammaṃ taṃ ettha rassapabhavanadiyā natthīti
analyzed: udakukkhepa sīmāya kammam udakukkhepa sīmā kammam tam ettha rassapa bhavanadiyā natthi iti

original: attho. Ayañhetthattho sace nadī nātidīghā hoti aḍḍhayojanaṃ vā gāvutaṃ vā aḍḍhagāvutaṃ
analyzed: atthaḥ sace nadī na ati dīghā hoti aḍḍha yojanam vā gāvutam vai aḍḍha gāvutam

original: vā, tassā pavattanaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya yāva nadītīrā sabbattha nadīpadese ajjhottharitvā

original: saṅgho nisīdati, tattha tasmiṃ nadīpadese samantato avasesanadiyā abhāvā vaggakammasaṅkābhāvena

analyzed: udakukkhepa sīmā kammam natthi kevalā nadī sīmāya iva ati sārattha dīpaniyam pi mātikā aṭṭhakathā āyalīna ttha ppakāsaniyam pi

original: etadeva sanniṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ vimativinodaniyaṃ pana yattha khuddake araññe mahantehi
analyzed: etat eva sanniṭṭhānam vuttam vimati vinodaniyam pana yattha khuddake araññe mahantehi

original: vā bhikkhūhi paripuṇṇatāya vaggakammasaṅkābhāvena sattabbhantarasīmāpekkhā natthi,
analyzed: vā bhikkhūhi paripuṇṇa tāya vagga kamma saṅkā abhāvena satta bbhantara sīmā apekkhā natthi

analyzed: tattha sattha abbhantara sīmā na uppajjati kevala arañña sīmāya iva tattha saṅghena kammaṃ

original: kātabbaṃ nadīādīsupi eseva nayo vakkhati hi sace nadī nātidīghā hoti, pabhavato paṭṭhāya

original: yāvamukhadvārā sabbattha saṅgho nisīdati, udakukkhepasīmākammaṃ natthī’ti ādi ca
analyzed: yāvamukha dvārā sabbattha saṅghaḥ nisīdati udakukkhepa sīmākammam natthi iti ādi ca

original: ubhayatthāpi ca. Yassaṃ disāyaṃ sattabbhantarassa vā udakukkhepassa vā okāso nappahoti,
analyzed: ubhayattha api ca disā ayam okāsaḥ nappahoti

original: tattha kathaṃ minanaṃ khipanaṃ vā bhaveyya, gāmakhettādīsu pavisanato akhette sīmā
analyzed: tattha katham minanam khipanam vā bhaveyya gāma khetta ādīsu pavisanataḥ akhette sīmā

original: paviṭṭhā nāmātisīmā vipajjeyya, apekkhāya sīmuppattiyaṃ pana yato pahoti, tattha
analyzed: paviṭṭhā nāma ati sīmā vipajjeyya apekkhāya sīmuppattiyam pana yatas pahoti tattha

original: sattabbhantaraudakukkhepasīmā sayameva paripuṇṇā jāyanti. Yato pana nappahoti, tattha
analyzed: satta abbhantara audakukkhepa sīmā sayam eva paripuṇṇāḥ jāyanti yatas pana tattha

analyzed: uppajjati iti attham vadanti tam ayutta rūpam viya dissati kasmā iti ce pāḷi naya virodhato

original: vimativinodaniyaṃ parato vuttavacanenāpi virodhato ca. Idañca vacanaṃ ācariyassa

analyzed: kesañci puggalānam vāda ppakāsana attham vuttam bhaveyya kasmā paratas vutta vacanena

analyzed: ca virujjhanataḥ ca tam paratas vaṇṇayissāma

original: Yathā ca loke vatiṃ aparikkhipitvā “idaṃ vatiyā ṭhāna”nti ca yathā ca naṅgalakoṭiyā

original: “idaṃ mama lāyitaṭṭhāna”nti ca na sakkā vattuṃ, evameva udakaṃ vā vālikaṃ vā hatthena

original: akhipitvā “ayameko udakukkhepoti ca, udakapatanaṭṭhānanti ca na sakkā vattuṃ. Ettha

original: ca dve bhikkhū evaṃ vivādaṃ karonti vimativinodaniyaṃ “yattha khuddake araññe mahantehi
analyzed: ca dve bhikkhū evam vivādam karonti vimati vinodaniyam yattha khuddake araññe mahantehi

analyzed: sattabbhantara sīmā na uppajjati kevala arañña sīmāya iva tattha saṅghena kammam kattabbam

analyzed: nattha iva ati te evam vattabbā mā sappurisāḥ evam vadeyyātha ācariya varam ca mā abbhācikkhatha

analyzed: tad upari dvitālīsa sahassa yojanam sinerumatthakam bhūmi tad upari dvetālīsa sahassa yojanam

original: ṭhānaṃ yāmānaṃ bhūmi. Iminā nayena yāva vasavattibhūmi dvitālīsasahassayojane tiṭṭhati,
analyzed: ṭhānam bhūmi iminā nayena yāva vasavatti bhūmi dvi tālīsa sahassa yojane tiṭṭhati

original: tasmā manussabhūmito yāva vasavattibhūmi dvesahassānipañcana hutāni duvesatasahassāni

original: yojanāni honti, tenetaṃ vuccati.
analyzed: yojanāni honti tena itam vuccati

original: “Manussabhūmito yāva, bhūmi vasavattantarā;

original: Duve satasahassāni, pañcanahutameva ca.
analyzed: duve sata sahassāni ca

original: Dvesahassañca madhikaṃ, yojanānaṃ pamāṇato;
analyzed: dvesahassam ca madhikam yojanānam pamāṇataḥ

original: Gaṇanā nāma bhūmīsu, saṅkhyā evaṃ pakāsitā”ti.
analyzed: gaṇanā nāma bhūmīsu saṅkhyā evam pakāsitā ati

original: Tatupari brahmapārisajjādayo tayo brahmuno pañcapaññāsasatasahassa aṭṭhasahassayojane
analyzed: tad upari brahma pārisajja ādayo tayo brahmuno aṭṭha sahassa yojane

original: samatale ṭhāne tiṭṭhanti. Dutiyatatiyabhūmībrahmunopi tappamāṇesu samatalesu tiṭṭhanti.
analyzed: sama tale ṭhāne tiṭṭhanti dutiya tatiya bhūmī brahmuno pi tappamāṇesu sama talesu tiṭṭhanti

original: Catutthabhūmiyaṃ pana vehapphalaasaññasattā tappamāṇe samatale ṭhāne tiṭṭhanti. Tatuparisuddhāvāsabhūmiyo
analyzed: catuttha bhūmiyam pana vehapphala asañña sattā tappamāṇe sama tale ṭhāne tiṭṭhanti

original: taṃtaṃ pamāṇe ṭhāne uparūpari tiṭṭhanti. Catassopi arūpabhūmiyo tappamāṇe ṭhāne uparūpari
analyzed: taṃ taṃ pamāṇe ṭhāne uparu upari tiṭṭhanti catasso api arūpa bhūmiyaḥ tad pamāṇe ṭhāne uparu upari

analyzed: tiṭṭhanti ettāvatā ca manussa bhūmitaḥ yāva bhavaggāḥ yojanānam ca aṭṭhārasa lakkhā

original: ca pañcanahutāni ca chasahassāni ca honti tenetaṃ vuccati porāṇehi.
analyzed: ca cha sahassāni ca honti tena itam vuccati porāṇehi

original: “Heṭṭhimā brahmalokamhā, patitā mahatī silā;
analyzed: heṭṭhimā brahma lokamhā patitā mahatī silā

analyzed: ahorattena ekena uggatāḥ aṭṭhatālīsam

original: Yojanānaṃ sahassāni, cātumāsehi bhūmi;

analyzed: saṭṭhi ca iva sahassāni ubbedhena pakāsitā

original: Yojanesupi vuttesu, hitvā kāmappamāṇakaṃ;

original: Aṭṭha ceva sahassāni, yojanāni pavuccare.

analyzed: tad pamāṇā ava daṭṭhabbā naya ggāhena dhīmatā

original: Bhūmito ābhavaggamhā, sattakoṭi aṭṭhārasa;

original: Lakkhā pañca nahutāni, chasahassāni sabbadāti.

original: Idameva sandhāya, yāvatā candimasūriyā.
analyzed: idam eva sandhāya yāvatā

original: Pariharanti disā bhanti, virocamānā yāvatā;
analyzed: pariharanti disā bhanti virocamānāḥ yāvatā

original: Tāva sahassadhā loke, ettha te vattatī vaso”ti.
analyzed: tāva sahassadhā loke ettha te vattatī vasoti

analyzed: vuttam etthantare sattā tiṭṭhanti tesam vitthāraḥ apubbam katvā kathetum a sakkuṇeyya ttā

analyzed: hi cattāraḥ buddhāḥ anubuddho sāvakabuddho paccekabuddho sammāsambuddho ti tattha

original: bahussutassa bhikkhuno buddhabhāvaṃ anujānantena ca.
analyzed: bahussutassa bhikkhunaḥ buddha bhāvam anujānantena ca

analyzed: dhamma kāyaḥ yatas satthā dhammo satthu kāyaḥ mataḥ

original: Dhammāsikoso saṅgho ca, satthusaṅkhyampi gacchatīti.

analyzed: sammā pakārena sayam pacitu pāramitā sayambhūtena sayambhu ñāṇena sayam eva anañña bodhito

original: hutvā savāsanasammohaniddāya accantaṃ vigato dinakarakiraṇasamāgamena paramarucirasirīsobhaggappattiyā

original: āposaṃvaṭṭo, tejosaṃvaṭṭo, vāyosaṃvaṭṭo. Tisso saṃvaṭṭasīmā ābhassarā, subhakiṇhā,

original: gahito hoti, taṃ mūlakattā. Vaḍḍhayamāno vivaṭṭakappo nāma. Tena vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyīpi

original: Tattha jātikhettaṃ dasasahassacakkavāḷapariyantaṃ hoti. Taṃ tathāgatassa paṭisandhiggahaṇaāyusaṅkhārossajjanādikālesupi

original: Visayakhettaṃ anantaṃ aparimāṇaṃ. Tattha jātikhettaāṇākhettāvasena dve khettāni ekato

original: Tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā yebhuyyena manussā ca bhummadevatā ca saṃvegajātā aññamaññaṃ

original: “Aparāpariyakammavasena yato micchādiṭṭhisamādānato sappurisūpanissayavasena virājetvā

original: sabbepi brahmaloke nibbattanti. Vassupacchedato pana uddhaṃ dīghassa addhuno accayena
analyzed: sabbe pi brahma loke nibbattanti vassa upacchedataḥ pana uddham dīghassa addhunaḥ accayena

original: dutiyo sūriyo pātubhavati. Pātubhūte ca tasmiṃ neva rattiparicchedo, na divā paricchedo
analyzed: dutiyaḥ sūriyaḥ pātubhavati pātubhūte ca tasmin na iva ratti paricchedaḥ na divā paricchedaḥ

original: paññāyati, eko sūriyo uṭṭheti, eko sūriyo atthaṃ gacchati. Avicchinnasūriyasantāpova loko hoti.
analyzed: paññāyati ekaḥ sūriyaḥ uṭṭheti ekaḥ sūriyaḥ attham gacchati a vicchinna sūriya santāpaḥ uva lokaḥ hoti

original: Pakatisūriye sūriyadevaputto atthi kappavināsakasūriye pana natthi. Pakatisūriyobhāsena
analyzed: pakati sūriye sūriyadevaputto atthi kappa vināsaka sūriye pana natthi pakati sūriya ubhāsena

original: ākāse valāhakā dhūmasikhāpi caranti. Kappavināsakasūriyobhāsena vigatadhūmavalāhakaṃ
analyzed: ākāse valāhakāḥ caranti kappa vināsaka sūriya ubhāsena vigata dhūma valāhakam

original: ādāsamaṇḍalaṃ viya nimmalaṃ hoti nabhaṃ ṭhapetvā gaṅgā, yamunā, sarabhū, aciravatī,
analyzed: ādāsa maṇḍalam viya nimmalam hoti nabham ṭhapetvā gaṅgā yamunā sarabhū aciravatī

original: mahīti, imā pañca mahānadiyo ṭhapetvā avasesapañcasatakunnadīādīsu udakaṃ sussati
analyzed: mahī iti imāḥ pañca mahānadiyaḥ ṭhapetvā avasesa pañca satakunnadī ādīsu udakam sussati

original: tato dīghassa addhuno accayena tatiyo sūriyo pātubhavati tasmiṃ pātubhūte pañca mahānadiyopi
analyzed: tatas dīghassa addhunaḥ accayena tatiyaḥ sūriyaḥ pātubhavati tasmin pātubhūte pañca mahā nadiyaḥ pi

original: sussanti. Tato dīghassa addhuno accayena catuttho sūriyo pātubhavati. Yassa pātubhāvā
analyzed: sussanti tatas dīghassa addhunaḥ accayena catutthaḥ sūriyaḥ pātubhavati yassa pātubhāvā

original: himavatī mahānadīnaṃ pabhavā sīhapatano, haṃsapatano, mandākinī, kaṇṇamuṇḍako, rathakāradaho,
analyzed: himavatī mahā nadīnam sīhapatanaḥ haṃsapatanaḥ mandākinī kaṇṇamuṇḍakaḥ rathakāradaho

original: anotattadaho, chaddantadaho, kuṇāladahoti ime satta mahāsarā sussanti. Tato dīghassa
analyzed: anotattadaho chaddantadaho kuṇāladaho ti ime satta mahā sarā sussanti tatas dīghassa

original: addhuno accayena pañcamo sūriyo pātubhavati, yassa pātubhāvā anupubbena mahāsamuddo
analyzed: addhunaḥ accayena pañcamaḥ sūriyaḥ pātubhavati yassa pātubhāvā anupubbena mahā samuddaḥ

original: aṅgulipabbatemanamattampi udakaṃ na saṇṭhāti. Tato dīghassa addhuno accayena chaṭṭho
analyzed: udakam na saṇṭhāti tatas dīghassa addhunaḥ accayena chaṭṭhaḥ

original: sūriyo pātubhavati, yasmiṃ pātubhāve sakalacakkavāḷaṃ ekadhūmaṃ hoti, pariyādinnasinehadhūmena
analyzed: sūriyaḥ pātubhavati yasmin pātubhāve sakala cakkavāḷam eka dhūmam hoti pariyādinna sineha dhūmena

original: yathā ca evaṃ koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷampi. Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena sattamo
analyzed: yathā ca evam koṭi sata sahassa cakkavāḷam pi tatas api dīghassa addhunaḥ accayena sattamaḥ

original: sūriyo pātubhavati, yassa pātubhāvā sakalacakkavāḷaṃ ekajālaṃ hoti saddhiṃ koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷehi
analyzed: sūriyo pātubhavati yassa pātubhāvā sakala cakkavāḷam eka jālam hoti saddhim koṭi sata sahassa cakkavāḷehi

original: yojanasatikādibhedā sinerukūṭāni palujjitvā ākāseyeva antaradhāyanti. Sāpi aggijālā
analyzed: yojana satika ādi bhedā sineru kūṭāni palujjitvā antaradhāyanti sā api aggi jālā

original: uṭṭhahitvā cātumahārājike gaṇhāti, tattha kanakavimānaratanavimānāni jhāpetvā tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ
analyzed: uṭṭhahitvā cātumahārājike gaṇhāti tattha kanaka vimāna ratana vimānāni jhāpetvā tāvatiṃsa bhavanam

original: gaṇhāti etenūpāyena yāva paṭhamajjhānabhūmi gaṇhāti. Tattha tayopi brahmaloke jhāpetvā
analyzed: gaṇhāti etena upāyena yāva paṭhamajjhāna bhūmi gaṇhāti brahmaloke jhāpetvā

original: ābhassare āhacca aṭṭhāsi. Sā yāva aṇumattampi saṅkhāragataṃ atthi, tāva nanibbāyi.
analyzed: ābhassare āhacca aṭṭhāsi sā yāva aṇumattam pi saṅkhāra gatam atthi tāva nanibbāyi

original: Sabbasaṅkhāraparikkhayā pana sappitelajhāpanaaggisikhā viya chārikampi anavasesetvā
analyzed: sabba saṅkhāra parikkhayā pana sappi tela jhāpana aggi sikhā viya chārikam pi an avasesetvā

original: nibbāyi. Heṭṭhā ākāsena saha upari ākāso eko hoti mahandhakāro. Evaṃ kappavināsakamahāmeghato
analyzed: nibbāyi heṭṭhā ākāsena saha upari ākāsaḥ ekaḥ hoti mahandhakāraḥ evam kappa vināsaka mahā meghato

original: yāvajālaparicchedā saṃvaṭṭo nāma ekamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ nāma. Atha dīghassa addhuno accayena
analyzed: yāvajāla paricchedā saṃvaṭṭaḥ nāma ekam asaṅkhyeyyam nāma atha dīghassa addhunaḥ accayena

original: mahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvā paṭhamaṃ sukhumaṃ vassati. Anupubbena kumudanāḷayaṭṭhimusalatālakkhandhādippamāṇāhi
analyzed: mahā meghaḥ vuṭṭhahitvā paṭhamam sukhumam vassati anupubbena kumuda nāḷa yaṭṭhi musala tāla kkhandha ādi ppamāṇāhi

original: dhārāhi vassanto koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu sabbaḍaḍḍhaṭṭhānaṃ pūretvā antaradhāyati.
analyzed: dhārāhi vassantaḥ koṭi sata sahassa cakkavāḷesu sabba ḍaḍḍha ṭṭhānam pūretvā antaradhāyati

original: Taṃ udakaṃ heṭṭhā ca tiriyañca vāto samuṭṭhahitvā ghanaṃ karoti. Parivaṭumaṃ paduminipatte
analyzed: tam udakam heṭṭhā ca tiriyañca vātaḥ samuṭṭhahitvā ghanam karoti parivaṭumam

original: udakabindusadisaṃ. Evaṃ aggijālanibbāyanato yāva koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷaparipūrato
analyzed: udaka bindu sadisam evam aggi jāla nibbāyanataḥ yāva koṭi sata sahassa cakkavāḷa paripūrataḥ

original: sampattimahāmegho, idaṃ saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī nāma, dutiyamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ nāma. Kathaṃ tāva
analyzed: sampatti mahā meghaḥ idam saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī nāma dutiyam asaṅkhyeyyam nāma katham tāva

original: mahantaṃ udakarāsiṃ vāto ghanaṃ karotīti ce. Vivarasampadānato taṃ vā tena piṇḍiyamānaṃ
analyzed: mahantam udaka rāsim vātaḥ ghanam karoti iti tam vā tena piṇḍiyamānam

original: ghanaṃ kariyamānaṃ parikkhayamānaṃ anupubbena heṭṭhā otarati. Otiṇṇotiṇṇe udake pubbe
analyzed: ghanam kariyamānam parikkhayamānam anupubbena heṭṭhā otarati otiṇṇa utiṇṇe udake pubbe

original: brahmalokaṭṭhāne brahmapāri sajja-brahmapurohitamahābrahmāvasena paṭhamajjhānabhūmi
analyzed: brahma loka ṭṭhāne brahmapāri sajja brahma purohita mahābrahma avasena paṭhamajjhāna bhūmi

original: paṭhamaṃ pātubhavati. Tato otiṇṇotiṇṇe udake catukāmāvacaradevalokaṭṭhāne anukkamena
analyzed: paṭhamam pātubhavati tatas otiṇṇa utiṇṇe udake catu kāmāvacara deva loka ṭṭhāne anukkamena

original: paranimmitavasavattī, nimmānaratī, tusitā, yāmāti cattāro kāmāvacaradevalokā pātubhavanti.
analyzed: cattāraḥ kāmāvacara deva lokā pātubhavanti

original: Tato purimapathaviṭṭhānaṃ otiṇṇe pana udake balavavātā uppajjanti. Te taṃ pidahitadvāre
analyzed: tato purima patha viṭṭhānam otiṇṇe pana udake balava vātāḥ uppajjanti te tam pidahita dvāre

original: dhamakaraṇe ṭhitaudakamiva nirussāsaṃ katvā nirujjhanti. Madhurodakaṃ parikkhayaṃ
analyzed: dhama karaṇe ṭhita odakam iva nirussāsam katvā nirujjhanti madhura udakam parikkhayam

original: gacchamānaṃ upari rasapathaviṃ samuṭṭhāpeti sā vaṇṇasampannāceva hoti gandharasasampannā
analyzed: gacchamānam upari rasa pathavim samuṭṭhāpeti sā hoti gandha rasa sampannā

original: ca, nirudakapāyāsassa upari paṭalaṃ viya tadā ca ābhassarabrahmaloke paṭhamatarābhinibbattā
analyzed: ca upari paṭalam viya tadā ca ābhassara brahmaloke paṭhamatara abhinibbattā

original: sattā āyukkhayā vā puññakkhayā vā tato cavitvā idhūpapajjanti. “Puññakkhayā vā”ti
analyzed: sattāḥ āyu kkhayāḥ vā puñña kkhayāḥ vā tatas cavitvā idhu upapajjanti puñña kkhayāḥ vā ati

original: iminā brahmūnaṃ āyuparicchedaṃ appatvāva kammakkhayena maraṇaṃ viññāyati. Te honti
analyzed: iminā āyu paricchedam kamma kkhayena maraṇam viññāyati te honti

original: sayaṃpabhā antalikkhacarā. Te aggaññasutte vuttanayena taṃ rasapathaviṃ sāyitvā taṇhābhibhūtā
analyzed: sayaṃpabhāḥ antalikkha carā te aggañña sutte vutta nayena tam rasa pathavim sāyitvā taṇhā abhibhūtā

original: āluppakāraṃ paribhuñjituṃ upakkamanti. Atha nesaṃ sayaṃ pabhā antaradhāyati, andhakāro
analyzed: āluppa kāram paribhuñjitum upakkamanti atha na isam sayam pabhā antaradhāyati andhakāraḥ

original: hoti te andhakāraṃ disvā bhāyanti. Tato nesaṃ bhayaṃ nāsetvā sūrabhāvaṃ janayantaṃ
analyzed: te andhakāram disvā bhāyanti tatas bhayam sūra bhāvam janayantam

original: paripuṇṇapaṇṇāsayojanaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ vā pātubhavati. Te taṃ disvā “ālokaṃ paṭilabhimhā”ti
analyzed: paripuṇṇa paṇṇāsi yojanam sūriya maṇḍalam vā pātubhavati te tam disvā ālokam paṭilabhimha ati

original: haṭṭhatuṭṭhā hutvā “amhākaṃ bhayaṃ nāsetvā sūrabhāvaṃ janayanto uṭṭhito, tasmā sūriyo
analyzed: haṭṭha tuṭṭhāḥ hutvā amhākam bhayam nāsetvā sūra bhāvam janayantaḥ uṭṭhitaḥ tasmā sūriyaḥ

original: hotū”ti sūriyo tvevassa nāmaṃ karonti. Atha sūriye divasaṃ ālokaṃ katvā atthaṅgate
analyzed: hotu uti nāmam karonti atha sūriye divasam ālokam katvā atthaṅgate

original: “yampi ālokaṃ labhimhā, sopi no naṭṭho”ti puna bhītā honti. Tesaṃ evaṃ hoti “sādhuvatassa
analyzed: yam pi ālokam labhimha saḥ api no naṭṭho ti puna bhītāḥ honti tesam evam hoti sādhuvatassa

original: aññaṃ ālokaṃ labheyyāmā”ti. Tesaṃ cittaṃ ñatvā viya ekūnapaññāsayojanaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ
analyzed: aññam ālokam labheyyāma ati tesam cittam ñatvā viya ekūna paññāsa yojanam canda maṇḍalam

original: pātubhavati. Te taṃ disvā bhiyyosomattāya haṭṭhatuṭṭhā hutvā “amhākaṃ chandaṃ ñatvā
analyzed: pātubhavati te tam disvā bhiyyosomattāya haṭṭha tuṭṭhāḥ hutvā amhākam chandam ñatvā

original: viya uṭṭhito, tasmā cando hotū”ti candotvevassa nāmaṃ karonti. Tato pabhuti rattidivā
analyzed: viya uṭṭhitaḥ tasmā candaḥ hotu uti nāmam karonti tato pabhuti ratti divā

original: paññāyanti. Anukkamena ca māsaddhamāsautusaṃvaccharā. Candimasūriyānaṃ pana pātubhūtadivaseyeva
analyzed: paññāyanti anukkamena ca candima sūriyānam pana

original: sinerucakkavāḷahimavantapabbatā pātubhavanti, te ca kho apubbaṃ acarimaṃ phagguṇapuṇṇamadivaseyeva
analyzed: sineru cakkavāḷa himavanta pabbatā pātubhavanti te ca kho apubbam acarimam

original: pātubhavanti. Kathaṃ yathānāma kaṅgubhatte paccamāne ekappahāreneva bubbuḷakāni uṭṭhahanti.
analyzed: pātubhavanti katham yathānāma kaṅgu bhatte paccamāne eka ppahārena iva bubbuḷakāni uṭṭhahanti

original: Eke padesā thūpathūpā honti, eke ninnaninnā, eke samasamā evameva thūpathūpaṭṭhāne
analyzed: eke padesā thūpa thūpāḥ honti eke ninna ninnāḥ eke samasamāḥ evam eva thūpa thūpa ṭṭhāne

analyzed: pabbatāḥ honti ninna ninna ṭṭhāne samuddāḥ samasamaṭṭhāne dīpā ti evam manussa loke saṇṭhite

original: cātumahārājikā, tāvatiṃsāti dve kāmāvacaradevalokā pacchato pātubhavanti. Bhūmanissitā
analyzed: cātumahārājikā dve kāmāvacara deva lokā pacchatas pātubhavanti bhūma nissitā

original: nāma hete dve devalokā. Evaṃ sampattimahāmeghato yāva candimasūriyapātubhāvo, idaṃ
analyzed: nāma ha ite dve deva lokāḥ evam sampatti mahā meghataḥ yāva candima sūriya pātubhāvaḥ idam

original: vivaṭṭo nāma tatiyamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ nāma. Atha tesaṃ sattānaṃ rasapathaviṃ paribhuñjantānaṃ
analyzed: vivaṭṭaḥ nāma tatiyam asaṅkhyeyyam nāma atha tesam sattānam rasa pathavim paribhuñjantānam

original: kammena ekacce vaṇṇavanto, ekacce dubbaṇṇā honti tattha vaṇṇavanto dubbaṇṇe atimaññanti.
analyzed: kammena ekacce vaṇṇavantaḥ ekacce dubbaṇṇāḥ honti tattha vaṇṇavantaḥ dubbaṇṇe atimaññanti

original: Tesaṃ mānātimānapaccayā sāpi rasapathavī antaradhāyati. Bhūmipappaṭako pātubhavati
analyzed: tesam māna atimāna paccayā sā api rasa pathavī antaradhāyati bhūmi pappaṭako pātubhavati

original: atha nesaṃ teneva nayena sopi antaradhāyati, patālatā pātubhavati, teneva nayena
analyzed: atha tena iva nayena sā upi antaradhāyati patāla tā pātubhavati tena iva nayena

original: sāpi antaradhāyati. Akaṭṭhapāko sāli pātubhavati akaṇo athuso suddho sugandho taṇḍulapphalo.
analyzed: sā api antaradhāyati a kaṭṭha pāko pātubhavati a kaṇaḥ athuso suddhaḥ sugandho taṇḍulapphalo

original: Tato nesaṃ bhājanāni uppajjanti te sālī bhājane ṭhapetvā pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyā ṭhapenti,
analyzed: tatas na īsam bhājanāni uppajjanti te sālī bhājane ṭhapetvā pāsāṇa piṭṭhiyā ṭhapenti

original: sayameva jālasikhā uṭṭhahitvā pacati. So hoti odano sumanajātipupphasadiso, na tassa
analyzed: sayam eva jālasikhā uṭṭhahitvā pacati saḥ hoti odanaḥ sumana jāti puppha sadisaḥ na tassa

original: sūpena vā byañjanena vā karaṇīyaṃ atthi. Yaṃyaṃ rasaṃ bhuñjitukāmā honti, taṃtaṃ
analyzed: sūpena vā byañjanena vā karaṇīyam atthi yaṃ yam rasam bhuñjitu kāmāḥ honti taṃ taṃ

original: rasova hoti. Tesaṃ taṃ oḷārikaṃ āhāraṃ āharataṃ tato pabhuti muttakarīsaṃ sañjāyati.
analyzed: rasaḥ uva hoti tesam tam oḷārikam āhāram āharatam tatas pabhuti mutta karīsam sañjāyati

original: Atha nesaṃ tassa nikkhamanatthāya vaṇamukhāni pabhijjanti. Purisassa purisabhāvo,
analyzed: atha nesam tassa nikkhamana atthāya vaṇa mukhāni pabhijjanti purisassa purisa bhāvaḥ

original: itthiyā itthibhāvo pātubhavati. Tatrasudaṃ itthī purisaṃ, puriso ca itthiṃ ativelaṃ
analyzed: itthiyāḥ itthi bhāvaḥ pātubhavati tatrasudam itthī purisam purisaḥ ca itthim ativelam

original: upanijjhāyati. Tesaṃ ativelaṃ upanijjhāyanabhāvā kāmapariḷāho uppajjati. Tato methunadhammaṃ
analyzed: upanijjhāyati tesam ativelam upanijjhāyana bhāvā kāma pariḷāhaḥ uppajjati tatas methuna dhammaṃ

original: paṭisevanti. Te asaddhammapaṭisevanapaccayā viññūhi garahiyamānā viheṭhiyamānā tassa
analyzed: paṭisevanti te asat dhamma paṭisevana paccayā viññūhi garahiyamānā viheṭhiyamānā tassa

original: asaddhammassa paṭicchādanahetu agārāni karonti.
analyzed: asat dhammassa paṭicchādana hetu agārāni karonti

original: Te agāraṃ ajjhāvasamānā anukkamena aññatarassa alasajātikassa sattassa diṭṭhānugatiṃ
analyzed: te agāram ajjhāvasamānāḥ anukkamena aññatarassa alasa jātikassa sattassa diṭṭha anugatim

original: āpajjantā sannidhiṃ karonti. Tato pabhuti kaṇopi thusopi taṇḍulaṃ pariyonaddhanti,
analyzed: āpajjantā sannidhim karonti tatas pabhuti kaṇaḥ upi thusaḥ upi taṇḍulam

original: lāyitaṭṭhānampi nappaṭivirūhati. Te sannipatitvā anuṭṭhunanti “pāpakā vata bho dhammā
analyzed: lāyita ṭṭhānam pi na paṭivirūhati te sannipatitvā anuṭṭhunanti pāpakāḥ vata bho dhammāḥ

original: sattesu pātubhūtā, mayaṃ pubbe manomayā ahumhā”ti. Aggaññasutte vuttanayena vittharetabbaṃ.
analyzed: sattesu pātubhūtāḥ mayam pubbe manaḥ mayāḥ ahumha iti aggañña sutte vutta nayena vittharetabbam

original: Tato mariyādaṃ ṭhapenti. Athaññataro satto aññassa bhāgaṃ adinnaṃ ādiyati. Taṃ dvikkhattuṃ
analyzed: tatas mariyādam ṭhapenti atha aññataraḥ satto aññassa bhāgam a dinnam ādiyati tam dvi khattum

original: paribhāsitvā tatiyavāre leḍḍudaṇḍehi paharanti. Te evaṃ adinnādānakalahamusāvādadaṇḍadānesu
analyzed: paribhāsitvā tatiya vāre leḍḍu daṇḍehi paharanti te evam adinnādāna kalaha musāvāda daṇḍa dānesu

original: uppannesu sannipatitvā cintayanti, “yaṃnūna mayaṃ ekaṃ sattaṃ sammanneyyāma, yo no
analyzed: uppannesu sannipatitvā cintayanti yam nūna mayam ekam sattam sammanneyyāma yaḥ naḥ

original: sammā khiyitabbaṃ khiyeyya, garahitabbaṃ garaheyya, pabbājetabbaṃ pabbājeyya, mayaṃ
analyzed: sammā khiyitabbam khiyeyya garahitabbam garaheyya pabbājetabbam pabbājeyya mayam

original: panassa sālīnaṃ bhāgaṃ anupadassāmā”ti. Evaṃ katasanniṭṭhānesu pana sattesu imasmiṃ
analyzed: panassa sālīnam bhāgam anupadassāma ati evam kata sanniṭṭhānesu pana sattesu imasmin

original: tāva kappe ayameva bhagavā bodhisattabhūto tena samayena tesu sattesu abhirūpataro
analyzed: tāva kappe ayam eva bhagavā bodhisatta bhūto tena samayena tesu sattesu abhirūpataraḥ

original: ca dassanīyataro ca mahesakkhataro ca buddhisampanno paṭibalo niggahapaggahaṃ kātuṃ

analyzed: buddha pacceka buddha sāvaka cakkavattino uppajjanti na tīsu asaṅkhyeyya kappesu tat ca

analyzed: bahūsu vināsam upagatesu avasiṭṭha satta santā na pavatta kusala kamma anubhāvena dasa vassato

original: Kevalaṃ panidha otiṇṇotiṇṇe udake ābhassarabrahmalokaṃ ādiṃ katvā lokapātubhāvo veditabbo.

original: bhikkhu pariyattiṃ sutvā dvepi pūreti tasmā pariyattiyā ṭhitāya sāsanaṃ ṭhitaṃ hoti

original: yathā mahātaḷākassa pāḷiyā thirāya udakaṃ na ṭhassatīti na vattabbaṃ udake sati padumādīni
analyzed: yathā mahā taḷākassa pāḷiyā thirāya udakam na na ṭhassati iti na vattabbam udake sati paduma ādīni

original: pupphāni na pupphissantīti na vattabbaṃ evameva mahātaḷākassa thirapāḷisadise tepiṭake
analyzed: pupphāni na pupphissanti iti na vattabbam evam eva mahā taḷākassa thira pāḷi sadise tepiṭake

original: buddhavacane sati mahātaḷāke udakasadisā paṭipattipūrakā kulaputtā natthīti na vattabbaṃ.
analyzed: buddha vacane sati mahā taḷāke udaka sadisā paṭipatti pūrakā kula puttā natthi iti na vattabbam

original: Tesu sati mahātaḷākesu padumādīni pupphāni viya sotāpannādayo ariyapuggalā natthīti
analyzed: tesu sati mahā taḷākesu paduma ādīni pupphāni viya sotāpanna ādayaḥ ariya puggalāḥ natthi iti

original: na vattabbaṃ, ekantato pariyattiyeva pamāṇaṃ pariyattiyā antarahitāya paṭipattipaṭivedhānaṃ
analyzed: na vattabbam ekantataḥ pariyattiyā iva pamāṇam pariyattiyāḥ anta rahitāya paṭipatti paṭivedhānam

original: antaradhānato. Tattha pariyattināma tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ sāṭṭhakathā pāḷiyāva
analyzed: antaradhānataḥ tattha pariyatti nāma tepiṭakam buddha vacanam sā aṭṭhakathā

original: sā tiṭṭhati, tāva pariyatti paripuṇṇā hoti. Gacchante kāle kaliyugarājāno adhammikā
analyzed: sā tiṭṭhati tāva pariyatti paripuṇṇā hoti gacchante kāle kali yuga rājānaḥ adhammikā

original: honti tesu adhammikesu rājāmaccādayo adhammikā honti tathā raṭṭhajanapadavāsinopi
analyzed: honti tesu adhammikesu rāja amacca ādayaḥ adhammikāḥ honti tathā raṭṭha janapada vāsinaḥ pi

original: adhammikā etesaṃ adhammikatāya na devo sammā vassati, tato sassāni na sampajjanti.
analyzed: adhammikāḥ etesam adhammika tāya na devaḥ sammā vassati tatas sassāni na sampajjanti

original: Tesu sampajjantesu paccayadāyakā bhikkhusaṅghassa paccaye dātuṃ na sakkonti. Bhikkhū
analyzed: tesu sampajjantesu paccaya dāyakāḥ bhikkhu saṅghassa paccaye dātum na sakkonti bhikkhū

original: paccayehi kilamantā antevāsike saṅgahetuṃ na sakkonti. Gacchante gacchante kāle pariyatti
analyzed: paccayehi kilamantāḥ antevāsike saṅgahetum na sakkonti gacchante gacchante kāle pariyatti

original: parihāyati, atthavasena dhāretuṃ na sakkonti, pāḷivaseneva dhārenti. Tato kāle gacchante
analyzed: parihāyati attha vasena dhāretum na sakkonti pāḷi vasena iva dhārenti tatas kāle gacchante

original: pāḷimpi sakalaṃ dhāretuṃ na sakkonti paṭhamaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ parihāyati. Parihāyamānaṃ
analyzed: pāḷim pi sakalam dhāretum na sakkonti paṭhamam abhidhammapiṭakam parihāyati parihāyamānam

original: matthakato paṭṭhāya pariyatti hāyati paṭhamañhi mahāpakaraṇaṃ parihāyati. Tasmiṃ
analyzed: matthakato paṭṭhāya pariyatti hāyati paṭhamam hi mahā apakaraṇam parihāyati tasmin

original: parihāyamāne yamakaṃ, kathāvatthu, puggalapaññatti, dhātukathā, vibhaṅgo, dhammasaṅgahoti
analyzed: parihāyamāne yamakam kathā vatthu puggala paññatti dhātu kathā vibhaṅgaḥ dhamma saṅgahaḥ ti

original: evaṃ abhidhammapiṭake parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya suttantapiṭakaṃ parihāyati. Paṭhamañhi
analyzed: evam abhidhamma piṭake parihīne matthakataḥ paṭṭhāya suttanta piṭakam parihāyati paṭhamam hi

original: aṅguttaranikāyo parihāyati. Tasmimpi paṭhamaṃ ekādasanipāto…pe… tato ekanipātoti
analyzed: aṅguttara nikāyo tasmin pi paṭhamam ekādasa nipāta upe tatas eka nipāta uti

original: evaṃ aṅguttare parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya saṃyuttanikāyo parihāyati, paṭhamaṃ mahāvaggo
analyzed: evam aṅguttare parihīne matthakataḥ paṭṭhāya saṃyutta nikāyo parihāyati paṭhamam mahā vaggo

original: parihāyati. Tato paṭṭhāya saḷāyatanavaggo, khandhavaggo, nidānavaggo, sagāthāvaggoti
analyzed: parihāyati tatas paṭṭhāya saḷāyatana vaggo khandha vaggo nidāna vaggo sagāthā vaggo ti

original: evaṃ saṃyuttanikāye parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya majjhimanikāyo parihāyati paṭhamañhi
analyzed: evam saṃyutta nikāye parihīne matthakataḥ paṭṭhāya majjhima nikāyaḥ parihāyati paṭhamam hi

original: uparipaṇṇāsako parihāyati. Tato majjhimapaṇṇāsako, tato mūlapaṇṇāsakoti evaṃ majjhimanikāye
analyzed: upari paṇṇāsako parihāyati tatas majjhima paṇṇāsako tatas mūla paṇṇāsako ti evam majjhima nikāye

original: parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya dīghanikāyo parihāyati, paṭhamañhi pāthiyavaggo parihāyati
analyzed: parihīne matthakataḥ paṭṭhāya dīgha nikāyo parihāyati paṭhamañhi pāthiya vaggo parihāyati

original: tato mahāvaggo, tato khandhakavaggoti dīghanikāye parihīne suttantapiṭakaṃ parihīnaṃ
analyzed: tatas mahā vaggo tatas khandhaka vaggo ti dīgha nikāye parihīne suttanta piṭakam parihīnam

original: nāma hoti. Vinayapiṭakena saddhiṃ jātakameva dhārenti. Vinayapiṭakaṃ lajjino dhārenti.
analyzed: nāma hoti vinaya piṭakena saddhim jātakam eva dhārenti vinaya piṭakam lajjinaḥ dhārenti

original: Lābhakāmā pana suttante kathitepi sallakkhentā natthīti jātakameva dhārenti. Gacchante
analyzed: lābha kāmā pana suttante kathite pi sallakkhentā na atthi iti jātakam eva dhārenti gacchante

original: kāle jātakampi dhāretuṃ na sakkonti. Atha nesaṃ paṭhamaṃ vessantarajātakaṃ parihāyati.
analyzed: kāle jātakam pi dhāretum na sakkonti atha nesam paṭhamam vessantara jātakam parihāyati

original: Tato paṭilomakkamena puṇṇakajākatakaṃ, mahānāradakassapajātakaṃ parihāyati. Vinayapiṭakameva
analyzed: tatas paṭiloma kkamena puṇṇaka jā katakam mahānārada kassapa jātakam parihāyati vinaya piṭakam eva

original: dhārenti. Gacchante kāle tampi matthakato parihāyati paṭhamañhi parivāro parihāyati,
analyzed: dhārenti gacchante kāle matthakato parihāyati paṭhamañhi parivāro parihāyati

original: tato khandhako bhikkhunīvibhaṅgo mahāvibhaṅgoti anukkamena uposathakkhandhakamattameva
analyzed: tatas khandhakaḥ bhikkhunī vibhaṅgaḥ mahā vibhaṅgaḥ ti anukkamena uposatha khandhaka mattam eva

original: dhārenti, tadā pariyatti anantarahitāva hoti. Yāva pana manussesu catuppadikagāthāpi
analyzed: dhārenti tadā pariyatti anantarahitā ava hoti yāva pana manussesu catuppadika gāthā api

original: pavattati, tāva pariyatti anantarahitāva hoti. Yadā saddho pasanno rājā hatthikkhandhe
analyzed: pavattati tāva hoti yadā saddhaḥ pasannaḥ rājā hatthikkhandhe

original: suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakamhi sahassatthavikaṃ ṭhapāpetvā “buddhehi kathitaṃ catuppadikaṃ gāthaṃ
analyzed: suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakamhi sahassa tthavikam ṭhapāpetvā buddhehi kathitam catuppadikam gātham

analyzed: na suṇantā api honti a suṇantā api yāva tatiyam gaṇhakam a labhitvā

analyzed: rāja purisā sahassatthavikam punar rājakulam pavesenti tadā pariyatti anta rahitāḥ nāma

original: hoti. Evaṃ pariyattiyā antarahitāya paṭipattipi paṭivedhopi antarahitova hoti. Saddhammasavanassa
analyzed: hoti evam pariyattiyāḥ antarahitāya paṭipatti pi paṭivedhaḥ pi antarahitaḥ va hoti saddhamma savanassa

analyzed: dullabha bhāvaḥ dhammasoṇḍaka vatthunā dīpetabbaḥ amhākam kira sammāsambuddho kassapa sammāsambuddhassa

analyzed: dhammarājassa sāsana antaradhānataḥ nacirena iva kālena bārāṇasi rañño putto dhammasoṇḍaka rāja kumāro

analyzed: hutvā pitu accayena rajje patiṭṭhāya kassapadasabalena desitam dhammam sotu kāmo hutvā

analyzed: catu akkhara niyamita dhamma desanā viyogena mayham idam rajjam na sobhati iti cintetvā

analyzed: a labhitvā punappunam dvi sahassam ti sahassam yāva sata sahassam koṭi dve sahassa koṭi

analyzed: ṭhatvā pucchāmi iti rakkhasena saddhim sallapantaḥ āha sāmi puñña deva rāja imasmin pana

original: vanaghane vasanakadevarājā kiṃ nukho dhammaṃ jānāsī”ti, devatā “mahārāja dhammaṃ
analyzed: vana ghane vasanaka deva rājā kim nu kho dhammam jānāsi iti devatāḥ mahā rāja dhammaṃ

original: jānāmī”ti āha. “Yadi dhammaṃ jānāsi, mayhaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathethā”ti āha. “Ahaṃ tuyhaṃ
analyzed: jānāmi iti āha yadi dhammam jānāsi mayham dhamma katham kathetha ati āha aham tuyham

analyzed: dhammam kathessāmi tvam mayham kīdisam dhamma kathikassa sakkāram karissasi iti āha

original: “Evaṃ sante mayhaṃ dhammaṃ kathetvā pacchā mayhaṃ sarīre maṃsaṃ khādissasī”ti āha.

original: “Ahaṃ mahārāja chāto hutvā dhammaṃ kathetuṃ na sakkomī”ti āha. “Yadi tumhe paṭhamaṃ

analyzed: maṃsam khādatha dhammam kaḥ suṇissati iti āha puna so rakkhasaḥ na aham dhammam desetuṃ

original: sakkomī”ti. Puna rājā “mayhaṃ dhammapaṭilābhañca tumhākaṃ maṃsapaṭilābhañca tumhe
analyzed: sakkomi iti punar rājā mayham dhamma paṭilābham ca tumhākam maṃsa paṭilābham ca tumhe

analyzed: jānitvā mayham dhammam desetha ati āha atha sakkaḥ devarājā sādhu hotha ati vatvā
